column1: Mass of Christian Burial on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 10:30 a.m.at St. Clare Catholic Church. Burial following at All Souls Cemetery. Family will receive friends to honor the life of Carol at THE DeJOHN-FLYNN-MYLOTT FUNERAL HOME OF SOUTH EUCLID
column4: 4600 MAYFIELD RD. (just east of Green Rd.) on MONDAY 4-8 PM.
